ImyaTweaks.Title: Basic Modifications of the Research Feature - Custom Research Points Limit

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Amount of Researchers to increase Research Point Limit
ImyaExpose.Description: Amount of Researchers needed after the initial 500 threshold to increase the Research Point threshold. [default = 100]

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Amount of Research Points added to Research Point Limit
ImyaExpose.Description: Amount of Research Points added to the Research Point Limit upon reaching the next Research pop Threshold. [default = 1000]
